javelin.model.state

Class BattleState

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.state.BattleState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Node, TeamContainer

    public class BattleState
extends java.lang.Object
implements Node, TeamContainer
    Javelin's implementation of Node. clone() is used for cloning the state but it does not clone the Combatant instances! You need to use #clone(Combatant)) afterwards to do so.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    cloneifdifferent(Combatant, Combatant)

      • hasLineOfSight

        public BattleState.Vision hasLineOfSight(Point me,
                                         Point target,
                                         int range,
                                         java.lang.String periodperception)
        Parameters:
        range - How many 5-feet squares ahead the active combatant can see.
        periodperception - Represents the light perception for the active combatant since some monsters may have the darkvision quality or similar. If night or evening the character will not able to see past obstacles in the map.
